meta.description: GEPT Elementary Speaking Practice Question Bank
meta.source: AMC GEPT 初級 全真模擬試題

sets.source: AMC 初級 全真模擬試題 第1回

part2.text: Did you hear a noise from downstairs?
Where did you spend your summer vacation?
Many foreign visitors come here for local dishes.
This is probably the sweetest song I've ever heard.
The managers agreed to move the meeting to 4:30 p.m.

Mr. Johnson recently bought his first house. He wanted a lot of space, so he chose a house in the country. It has three floors, a basement, and a balcony. He is now shopping for things that he'll need in his new home, and he can't wait to move in!

part3.question: How many languages do you speak? What are they?
part3.model_answer: I speak three languages fluently. Mandarin and Taiwanese are my mother tongues, and I've learned English for many years.

part3.question: What is your favorite place to study? Why?
part3.model_answer: My favorite place to study is the library. I like it because it's very quiet. There are many people working hard on their studies. Seeing them makes me want to study hard, too.

part3.question: Have you ever stayed up all night?
part3.model_answer: Yes, I have. I went camping with my friends, and we spent the whole night playing games and chatting. It was really fun, so we didn't feel tired at all the next day.

part3.question: When did you last go to a department store? What did you buy?
part3.model_answer: The last time I went to a department store was a few months ago when it had a big sale. I went there with my family, and we bought a new juice maker.

part3.question: Do you prefer hot drinks or cold drinks? Why?
part3.model_answer: I prefer hot drinks because I think they're better for my health. Drinking too many cold drinks gives me stomachaches.

part3.question: If you could live anywhere, where would you live?
part3.model_answer: If I could live anywhere, I'd like to live in Japan. I really like Japanese culture, and I've always wanted to experience life in Japan.

part3.question: Your friend Linda went hiking last week. Ask her some questions about it.
part3.model_answer: Who did you go hiking with? How was the weather that day? Will you go there again?
